title: The One About Art
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry, Bob and Monét dive into the world of art. They reflect on the art they made growing up in school, how they flowered their homes with art pieces, and they discuss pop art and performance art. Tune in for an oral history lesson on Banksy and Marina Abramović!
Visit SquareSpace.com for a free trial, and when you are ready to launch, go to SquareSpace.com/rivalry to save 10% of your first purchase of a website or domain!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
